title: Rescue the gnome
content:
t the Grymforge, in the quest Save the Grymforge Gnomes.

Rescue the Gnome Notes & Tips

Note: You can cast Feather Fall on him, but unfortunately it won't have an effect if you choose to release brakes. There's explosive in gnome's backpack, you can use it in combat, or keep it for Find the Explosives.

Quests in Baldur's Gate 3 Acquire the Gauntlets for Helsik ♦ Aid the Underduke ♦ Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help ♦ Avenge Glut's Circle ♦ Avenge the Drowned ♦ Avenge the Hag Survivors ♦ Avenge
